author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DKSH Holding FY Net Sales Grow By 4.8% To CHF 11.0 Bln
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - DKSH Holding AG:
* NET SALES GROW BY 4.8% IN 2017 TO CHF 11.0 BILLION * FY OPERATING PROFIT (EBIT) INCREASES TO CHF 297.0 MILLION, UP 1.4%
* FY PROFIT AFTER TAX OF CHF 213.3 MILLION SLIGHTLY ABOVE LAST YEARâ€™S LEVEL
* PROPOSAL TO INCREASE ORDINARY DIVIDEND BY 10.0% TO CHF 1.65 PER SHARE
* EXPECTS AN INCREASED NET SALES AND PROFIT GROWTH RATE FOR 2018
* RAINER-MARC FREY WILL NOT STAND FOR REELECTION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS Source text - bit.ly/2BVn4ah Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
